EmailTemplate.description: To send to rep if more information is required to complete their request.
EmailTemplate.name: Acct Maint WRF Need More Information
EmailTemplate.subject: Account Maintenance - Need More Information - {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Case.WRF_Requestor_Name__c},
There is more information required to complete your request.
[Insert needed info here]
Please provide this information at your earliest convenience. Your request will be put on hold until we receive this information.
Your Support # is {!Case.CaseNumber} You can click here to view the request in Salesforce.com.
Thank you, Account Maintenance Team
